response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and your potential need for it, I propose a price of $120. This allows us both to find a fair compromise where you can acquire something valuable without overpaying, and I can ensure a reasonable return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 120}
